document.full_text: concacaf general secretary chuck blazer has refused to cut ties with lawyers looking into bribery allegations, putting him at loggerheads with the troubled soccer confederation's new interim president.
document.title: blazer refuses to cut ties with lawyers in bribery probe
lines_and_colors: concacaf general secretary chuck blazer has refused to cut ties with lawyers looking into bribery allegations, putting him at loggerheads with the troubled soccer confederation's new interim president.
